name: breqi
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3
body: |- wb(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c0, c3, c2))

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wb(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c0, c3, c2)), wceq(c1, c3))

body.origin:
|- wb(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c0, c3, c2))
-| wceq(c1, c3)
-| wi(wceq(c1, c3), wb(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c0, c3, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c0, c3, c2))
-| wceq(c1, c3)
-| wi(wceq(c1, c3), wb(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c0, c3, c2)))

body.origin: |- wi(wceq(c1, c3), wb(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c0, c3, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c0, c3, c2))
-| wceq(c1, c3)

comment: Equality inference for binary relations. (Contributed by NM, 19-Feb-2005.)
